price: Kuma idan aka ce musu: "Kada ku yi ɓarna a cikin ƙasa," sukan ce: "Mũ mãsu kyautatawa kawai ne!"
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ لَا تُفۡسِدُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّمَا نَحۡنُ مُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahum lā tuf'sidū fī al-arḍi qālū innamā naḥnu muṣ'liḥūna
